text: train crash investigation new york mag
goes by weekly the ultimate selfie good
morning this is the new york times
minute as Monday's commute begins
investigators continue to look for
causes of yesterday's deadly train
derailment in the Bronx there's been
speculation that the train was going too
fast into the turn but officials warn
it's too soon to know the investigation
will take time to piece together the MTA
wants to know as much as anyone what
happened with his accident in the battle
between the printed and the pixelated
word another casualty after 40 years of
weekly distribution New York Magazine
will hit newsstands every other week
starting this spring the 3.5 million
dollar savings will go towards web
efforts there could be no more vivid
example of how digital is overtaking
print and three hour long lines where a
man has an art exhibit what's inside
yayoi kusama is infinity mirrored room
where your very own image is replicated
in a cosmos of LED lights it's a selfie
paradise
